channel.title: 2017 12 10 on Zack's Notablog
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 12 10 on Zack's Notablog

item.title: Books I read
item.description: I’ve read about 15 books this year - not as many as I’d like (I read 40 in college), but I did a lot of magazine reading too (e.g. The Sun and The New Yorker). The books that I read can be classified into three major categories: non-fictional animal encounters, magical horror realism and fictional non-fiction. The first main category are books I read in 2017 are about non-fictional animal encounters.
